text: [You stare out in front of you at the pool. The water is green and full of weird fuzzy stuff.]

name: Nathan
text: Alligators! Come out, come out, wherever you are!

name: Nathan
text: As you can see, I am like you! So you can…come out and we can be friends!
[You carefully circle the edge of the pool, gripping the flashlight in your hand and trying not to slip.]
